trans-unit.source: Minimum points for showing this finishing text. Click here for more details

If the player has reached this amount of points at minum and there is no other finishing text with a higher minimum points amount, which has fullfilled this condition, than the this finishing text will be shown at the end of the game. Precondition: You need to assign this finishing text to the morphing quiz game in the flexform of the frontend plugin.
Text to be displayed at the end of the game, if the minimum points are reached.
